text: The 2016 BSWW Mundialito is a beach soccer tournament that takes place at Praia de Carcavelos in Cascais, Portugal, from 29 July to 31 July 2016. This competition with 4 teams was played in a round-robin format. ==Participating nations== * (host) * * * ==Standings== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width="175"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- style="background-color: #ccffcc;" |align=left| |3||3||0||0||36||5||+25||9 |- |align=left| |3||2||0||1||30||11||+13||6 |- |align=left| |3||1||0||2||14||16||–2||3 |- |align=left| |3||0||0||2||2||38||–36||0 |} ==Schedule & Results== \---- \---- ==Winners== ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:auto" !width=33% colspan="4"| Best Player (MVP) |- |align="center" colspan="4"| |- !colspan="4"| Top Scorer(s) |- |align="center" colspan="4"| |- !colspan="4"| Best Goalkeeper |- |colspan="4" align="center"| |} ==Top scorers== 8 goals * Lucão 6 goals * José Maria * Nick Perera 5 goals * Datinha * Bruno Xavier * Bê Martins 4 goals * Filipe * Nuno Belchior 3 goals * Bokinha * Bruno Novo 2 goals * Madjer * Rui Coimbra * Jason Santos * Tomas Canale * Jason Leopoldo 1 goals * Mauricinho * Fernando Ddi * Mão * Catarino * Felipe * Bruno Torres * Alan * Adriano dos Santos * Wan Chao * Cai Wei Ming ==See also== *Beach soccer *BSWW Mundialito *Euro Beach Soccer League ==References== ==External links== *Beach Soccer Worldwide Category:BSWW Mundialito BSW Category:2016 in beach soccer
